entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening and ending late this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
